lenders.name: Aidan Lanigan
lenders.loan_because:
I like the idea that we can facilitate people helping themselves. 

The loans that we provide are used where these funds are most needed and by individuals that are both entrepreneurial and as importantly, doing all they can to help improve the lives of both their families and wider communities. Together we are adding to the capital available across a wide section of our global community that is often neglected.

lenders.name: Brooke
lenders.occupation: Contract Specialist for a Tech Company
lenders.loan_because:
We are ALL in this together! There is more than enough wealth in this world to share with all! And I'm more than happy to share what little of this wealth I have with those who truely need it!

May 10, 2010 - I initially joined Kiva in Nov 2009 and I loaned $25 each to five different people. In the meantime, with the money that's been paid back and that goes back into my Kiva account - instead of withdrawing it via PayPal,  I just re-lend it to other struggling entrepreneurs. It's truly rewarding to help. I could easily withdraw the money and be done - but it's more fun to just use that same initial $150 and continue cycling that money through. If I ever chose to - I could stop lending and get my $150 back - but I don't need it at much as the folks do. $25 at a time can really help these people out. I encourage all who are reading this to join! You can read how it all works here: http://www.kiva.org/about/how

May 20, 2015 - I'm still a member and still believe in what Kiva does! So happy to be a part of it! I've made a total of 25 loans now by recycling the same $150 I used in 2009. It has equaled a total of $650 of total loans. Whenever I get repaid, I just choose another person to loan it back out to. 


Thanks & please consider joining Kiva!,
Brooke

--

lenders.name: Ilan
lenders.occupational_info:
Having performed many thousands of successful laser procedures, Dr. Ilan Cohen is one of the most experienced surgeons in the nation. He was the first surgeon in the New York City area to perform cutting edge corneal surgery such as the implantable contact lens and the artificial corneal transplant. He has been featured on CBS, CBNC and Fox news for his innovative surgical techniques. He is a graduate of the Tufts University School of Medicine in Boston and completed a unique Cornea and Refractive Surgery fellowship at the renowned Vanderbilt University Hospital.

Dr. Cohen is considered the experts’ expert by his colleagues and is the address to which they refer their most challenging cases. He teaches at the American Academy of ophthalmology, where eye surgeons from all around the world gather to learn about the cutting edge advances in LASIK surgery. He is also an Author of the most popular and recent book; read by LASIK surgeons all around the world.

Dr. Cohen has devoted his entire life to the perfection and fine tuning of innovative surgical techniques that provide an added level of safety and new options that were previously unavailable.

Call: 866-731-3937 | lasik, eye doctor, lasik surgery, lasik eye surgery, lasik cost, icl, lasik vision, eye surgeon ny, new york, new jersey, nj

Michael Podemski is a Manager in the Advisory Services practice of Ernst & Young LLP. He focuses on assurance engagements, including Financial Audit IT Integration and Service Organization Controls Reporting. Prior to Ernst & Young, he has 14 years of experience in IT internal audit, IT operations, and IT solutions delivery. 

Michael has provided these services to companies comprising a wide range of industries including: banks and capital markets, financial services, insurance, and pharmaceuticals. 

In addition to his role as a Manager in the Advisory Services practice, Michael is a board member of the Chicago chapter of ISACA and the Chicago ACL User Group.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I can and its the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I travel for a living.

lenders.name: Shauna
lenders.loan_because: I love to help

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: a little money can make such a big difference in someone's life

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: I believe those of us who have so much, need to share it who does of us who are wanting. Share our good fortunes, if you will. We are One world and One people and as such we need to be responsible stewards of our world, peoples and environment.

lenders.name: Dave in Perth
lenders.loan_because: ...now I can tell those pesky Salvo's at the pub that I gave at the office.
lenders.occupational_info:
About Me:? 
I have a lustrous black coat, and a curious attraction to inflated latex gloves.

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do to assist our brothers and sisters who do not have the opportunities we do.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because:
I respect and admire those who take a chance and start their own business.

A long time ago my eyes were opened thanks to my involvement in the international organization AIESEC. I have also had the opportunity to see some of the world, including some of the main lending countries,  and realize we all have very similar goals and aspirations. If in a small way I'm able to help others reach their goals, that helps fulfill my own.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an IT consultant and project manager.

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.loan_because: in another life it could've been me.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Maths to 11-18 year-olds. Some of them appreciate it!

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: It's a small way to make a big difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I help employees with questions about their healthcare and retirement benefits.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate the challenge of trying to start a business.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help people have a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a disabling spinal cord injury from a car accident and I am unemployed.

lenders.name: THOMAS
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping those less fortunate than myself.

lenders.name: Ronda
lenders.loan_because: I know what it means to just need a little help to get started. People in my life have been good to me and I choose to pass on the favor.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am disabled so I cannot do traditional jobs in the US. I am a single parent and write books, and sew to bring in extra money. I have one published book and am working on a second. 
I love to grow food, be with nature and enjoy my family.

lenders.name: Beady Tea
lenders.whereabouts: newcastle upon tyne Tyne and Wear

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I have made this loan on behalf of Prof. Jim Li's RPI Modeling and Control Class of the Spring of 2008.  I make this loan in his name because he was an inspiration for all of us to give back to the world we live in.  Thank you for all that you did, Professor Li.  Rest in Peace.

lenders.name: Brian Mathes
lenders.loan_because: I do it for Chuck.
lenders.occupational_info: Cog in wheel, moves bigger cog on bigger wheel.

lenders.name: Karla
lenders.occupational_info: Association Business Solutions, Inc. (ABS) provides association management, marketing, writing, public relations and government affairs services to help clients achieve greater success.

lenders.name: Noz & Erica
lenders.loan_because: We want to connect with people who need help.
lenders.occupational_info: Noz is an endodontist, and Erica assists organizations in communicating their stories to people who are important to them.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: i like the idea of helping people help themselves. it's not a hand out. these people have a plan to better their own lives. they are taking charge of their own destinies but need a little help.
lenders.occupational_info: I make formal gowns and historic clothing.

lenders.name: Susannah
lenders.loan_because: I am more fortunate than I usually remember

lenders.name: Xiby
lenders.loan_because: Why the hell not, I can afford too.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people use technology in the ways most beneficial to themselves.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: i need to pay off all the bank bill that my family have left down.really hope that God will help me with all the kind help.
lenders.occupational_info: working at bar with very low pay

lenders.name: Wereldwinkel Gravenzande
lenders.loan_because: With 35 volunteers we know how it is to run a company in a fair and profitable way. We like to support others in doing the same!
lenders.occupational_info: we buy and sell Fair Trade products

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: doing a little something is better than doing a lot of nothing.

lenders.name: Reuel
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: A little bit of everything.

lenders.name: Chiranjeeva
lenders.loan_because:
I want to help others live a healthy and productive life.

If we want to live in peace and protect the earth for the future we need to recognize that human desperation is a threat to all of humanity. We should try to build a world where humans do not have to live in desperate situations because the power of the human mind and collective effort can sustain the whole world's population.

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: I want to change someone's life. My goal is to lend to at least one person in all 196 countries.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: It's uplifting!

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I love God and my neighbor with all my being (Matthew 22:37-40)

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs opportunities and deserves possibilities for change.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people see the opportunities in change.

lenders.name: Shirley
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Kevin & Lyn
lenders.loan_because: Its great being a small part of this worldwide community helping others with a hand up.

lenders.name: Theresa
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping to make a difference for people who are working hard to better their lives.

lenders.name: Jamie W.
lenders.loan_because: I have a little spare cash and would like to help people develop themselves and see the results.
lenders.occupational_info: A tough job but someone's gotta do it.

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others and teach my son.

lenders.name: Lance
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back and make a difference in the world...as small as that may be. I embrace the philosophy of teaching people to fish, rather than simply giving them fish.

lenders.name: Dmitri
lenders.loan_because: I have the desire to give those around me a fighting chance to make a difference in their own lives, as well as the lives of those around them.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist displaced workers frind training and schooling to get them back into the job market and finding a great career.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good knowing we are helping deserving people get ahead.
lenders.occupational_info: Government computer work

lenders.loan_because:
We believe that by lending, we are providing an opportunity for someone to better themselves. 
Empowerment through lending.

lenders.name: Kathleen & Jesse
lenders.occupation: Former Beauty Salon Owner and her boyfriend

lenders.occupational_info: Kathleen retired from a successful beauty salon in Norton MA, called "About Face", in order to return to school to become a nurse.
